means: 先验论者的，超越论者的

sentence.Network_en: Certainly Emerson stated the transcendentalist outlook more fully than any of his fellows.
sentence.Network_cn: 的确,爱默生把超验论的观点说得比其他同伴更透彻.

sentence.Network_en: In 1845, a great transcendentalist work Walden was born.
sentence.Network_cn: 1845年, 写成了超验主义的伟大作品《沃尔登》.
